name: Software Development
description: Rome wasn't built in a day, and neither was our website. Learn state-of-the-art app building and end-to-end full stack development with zero compromises. Do you have anything in particular you want to learn? No problem! Our team of developers have experience in various fields, and can help out whenever required.

name: Machine Learning
description: What if you were told that 15 years from now, the code that you currently write "manually", will learn to write itself automatically. Interesting, right? That's barely scratching the surface. Come learn about the future with us where we teach and code machine learning from scratch. We also provide a roadmap so everyone can learn at their own pace.

name: Competitive Programming
description: We are a community of passionate coders. Join us on a journey to master the tricks of the trade - popular CP concepts, algorithms and stratagems, boosting your cognitive and logical reasoning as well as enhancing your coding interviews skills along the way. It doesn't end there! We also hold contests where you can battle it out with your peers and challenge yourself. Our team is available 24/7 to clarify your doubts, provide curated resources and any other assistance you may need.
